dataset_info.name: ROCStories
dataset_info.source_paper: Mostafazadeh, N., et al. (2016). A Corpus and Cloze Evaluation for Deeper Understanding of Commonsense Stories

curated_subset.description: Scenarios used in Antunes et al. (2023) 'Prompting for Socially Intelligent Agents with ChatGPT'
selection_criteria: Stories featuring clear social interactions between characters
Scenarios with identifiable agents (named or role-based)
Suitable for FAtiMA Toolkit BDI agent modeling

usage_instructions.load_all_rocstories: from data_utils.scenario_loader import RocStoriesLoader; loader = RocStoriesLoader(); scenarios = loader.load_all()
usage_instructions.sample_n_random: from data_utils.scenario_loader import RocStoriesLoader; loader = RocStoriesLoader(); scenarios = loader.sample(n=20, seed=42)
